## Plane.FromPositionAndNormal() method

Creates a plane from an origin point and a normal

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromPositionAndNormal(origin: Vector3, normal: Vector3): Plane;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  origin | <code>Vector3</code> | origin of the plane to be constructed |
|  normal | <code>Vector3</code> | normal of the plane to be constructed |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Plane`

a new Plane the normal vector to this plane at the given origin point. Note : the vector "normal" is updated because normalized.
